page.title: 06School Health
page.content:
A School Sister has to have the minimum qualifications of S.R.N.
Functions Promoting health and well being in the schoolchild, enabling them to reach their full potential. { Identification of deviation from the normal physical, emotional, mental or social development and liaison with the appropriate referral agencies. Ensuring that the special needs of a child are recognised so that there is no unneccessary disadvantage through ill health. Assists in the control of outbreaks of infections and infestations and advises school staff, children and parents on preventive measures to limit the spread of infection.
